scripts.build:sass: npm run build:sass:login && npm run build:sass:account
scripts.build:sass:login: mkdirp helsinki/login/resources/css && npm run build:sass:hds -- helsinki/login/resources/css/hds.css && npm run build:sass:shared -- helsinki/login/resources/css/shared.css && npm-sass sass/login/index.scss > helsinki/login/resources/css/hs-login.css
scripts.build:sass:account: mkdirp helsinki/account/resources/css && npm run build:sass:hds -- helsinki/account/resources/css/hds.css && npm run build:sass:shared -- helsinki/account/resources/css/shared.css && npm-sass sass/account/index.scss > helsinki/account/resources/css/hs-account.css
